content:
I'm playing at https://adam.math.hhu.de/#/g/leanprover-community/nng4/world/AdvMultiplication/level/6.

The last hint on this screenshot is slightly incorrect:

Screenshot 2025-02-01 at 16.07.15.png

(It says hx where it should say h2)

It appears that the fix for this typo has already been merged in July: https://github.com/leanprover-community/NNG4/pull/73.

However it's not reflected in the live version. Is the live version outdated?
I'm always terrified to update the live version for fear that it will delete everyone's progress :-)
OK I've just merged some NNG PRs and I'm going to attempt to remember how to update the game on the server. Hope you backed everything up at your end ;-)

OK it looks like I managed to deploy; the bug you report above should be fixed now. Over the last couple of years NNG has been very very low on my priority list because (a) it basically works (b) Jon Eugster has been looking after it (c) I have been rushed off my feet. But I resolved to take it easy in 2025 and spend a lot of time in London proving Fermat's Last Theorem and so I find myself with more time to do this stuff (I did 8 hours of FLT today so I need a break!)
Dan Abramov has marked this topic as resolved.
